definition: to pour cold water/fig. to discourage
to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
surname Leng
cold
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: We must not pour cold water on their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能给他们的热情浇冷水。

sentences.english: Don't throw cold water on them.
Daniel splashed his face with cold water to try to wake himself up.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔往脸上浇冷水，想使自己清醒过来。

sentences.english: Pouring cold water on skin burns can provide temporary relief.
sentences.chinese: 在灼伤的皮肤上浇冷水可暂时止疼。

sentences.english: Don't pour clod water on the idea.
sentences.chinese: 对这个意见不要浇冷水。

definition: lit. to pour cold water on/fig. to dampen one's enthusiasm
